name: Portainer
short_description: Container management UI for Docker environments. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Container management UI for Docker environments. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Portainer is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, docker, containers. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Portainer on your home server to container management ui for docker environments. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Portainer to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
